testimonials.name: Birger
testimonials.review: Super fun and nice experience, learned a lot of neat tricks.

testimonials.name: Maina
testimonials.review: Would recommend water painting, very fun and great value. Teacher were very positive and inspiring.

testimonials.name: Ingvild
testimonials.review: Great course, good teachers, amazing atmosphere. I Tried the canvas painting and I'm definitely coming back for another course soon.
